enhanced_description: MediBuddy is an end-to-end digital healthcare platform designed to provide comprehensive health insurance services and medical consultations. Users can easily view their health insurance policies, initiate and track claims, and utilize cashless services at network hospitals, including intimating hospitalizations. The platform notably offers unlimited free consultations with top doctors across 18+ specialties, extended to up to 6 family members, covering all health problems.
